Name: Kang-Apron
LongDescription: Makes it easier to find Hidden Stairs in dungeons. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Kangaskhan.  Finding a Kang-Apron at the Croagunk Swap Shop is very lucky! Make sure you get it before someone else does! An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
